column4: hmm, an installation in synaptic seems to have halted .... How can I abort the installation, ctrl+c, or closebutton won't do anything. Also, the synaptic window is highlighted in the taskbar :)
open terminal, type xkill, then click on synaptic with the "x"
genreally if you use nmap and assure ally our ports are closed and you deny the correct hosts in '/etc/hosts.deny' your generally safe.  'spoofing IP' is ineffective
